name: Kung Fu Arcade
description:
A kung fu fighting game imitating the style of black and white TV in the 80s.
KungFu Arcade maybe is the best Kung Fu action game. You’ll be fighting against tons of enemies and the Big BOSS. You will need to be very fast and a real Kung Fu Master to kill all ennemies coming.
You can use punches, kicks and even weapons (shuriken, knifes, axe, kunai, nunchaku,...) and special moves (katas, fast kicks, stealth moves...).
Follow the in-game tutorial to learn how to defeat your enemies. In addition, you can also use keyboard, mouse or touch screen as game control hardware.Have a good time.
